ISSUE.TITLE: Browser hangs up when ~1000 rows of locations are visualized in Map
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi! ### Issue Summary Browser hangs up and will respond after, like, 15 seconds for any click or scroll - when about 1000 rows of locations (latitude, longitude) are visualised in Map! ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Execute a query which returns about 1000 rows with latitude and longitude in separate columns. Make sure the locations are nearby and can be clustered. 2. Create a new visualization of Map type and save. You can now notice the behaviour. ![screenshot 2017-02-15 16 09 32](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7479937/22971134/bafa47a0-f39a-11e6-8a42-0e36d59b1a77.png) ### Technical details: * Redash Version: 0.12.0.b2449 * Browser/OS: Chrome 56.0.2924.87 on macOS Sierra 10.12.2 * How did you install Redash: Docker composer Thanks!
